statements: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, manager_id FROM employees WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, manager_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' OR department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY manager_id, employee_name;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, employee_name;
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT name, department FROM employee WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT name, department, role FROM employee ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, name, department, role FROM employee WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, role FROM employee WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, productivity_score FROM performance_metrics WHERE attendance_score > 90 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employee WHERE role IN ('Manager', 'Supervisor') AND department <> 'IT';

SELECT employee_id, name, department, productivity_score + attendance_score AS total_score FROM employee JOIN performance_metrics ON employee.employee_id = performance_metrics.employee_id ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT employee_id, productivity_score, error_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE productivity_score > 80;
SELECT evaluation_date, performance_review FROM evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT employee_name, error_rate FROM employees JOIN performance_metrics ON employees.employee_id = performance_metrics.employee_id WHERE error_rate > 0.5;
SELECT e.employee_name, ev.evaluator, ev.evaluation_date FROM employees e JOIN evaluations ev ON e.employee_id = ev.employee_id WHERE ev.evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department, employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date_measured DESC, metric_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM remote_evaluation GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York' OR manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_data;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employee_data WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_id, join_date, department FROM employee_data ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, join_date FROM employee_data WHERE department='Finance' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, join_date FROM employee_data WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_data WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, join_date FROM employee_data WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_data WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 90 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, employee_name FROM departments JOIN employee_data ON departments.department_manager = employee_data.employee_id;
